newsitem.title: USA: CRIIMI MAE sells 5 mln shrs at $15.625/shr.
newsitem.headline: CRIIMI MAE sells 5 mln shrs at $15.625/shr.

text.p: CRIIMI MAE Inc said it has closed an offering of today closed an underwritten public offering of 5,069,000 common shares to the public at $15.625 a share.
The underwriting group for the offering, which raised $79 million, was led by Merrill Lynch & Co. and included Friedman, Billings, Ramsey & Co., Inc., Lehman Brothers and BT Securities Corporation.

The offering provides the company with the capital necessary to acquire additional subordinated tranches of commercial mortgage-backed securities and continue the vertical integration of its commercial mortgage operations, CRIIMI MAE said.
The net cash proceeds of approximately $75 million may be used temporarily to pay down short term borrowings or invest in short term, interest bearing accounts, CRIIMI MAE said.
